description: This file defines the HomeBrowseFragment class that implements a home screen for an Android TV app using the Leanback library. It sets up a browse interface with multiple categories, including static, dynamic, and live TV rows, and manages navigation to details, search, and live TV activities. It also includes a CardPresenter class for rendering content cards.

classes.name: HomeBrowseFragment
classes.description: A fragment implementing the home browsing interface with categories and dynamic content loading.

classes.name: SimpleCard
classes.description: A data class representing a simple card with a title and subtitle.

classes.name: CardPresenter
classes.description: A Presenter responsible for rendering content cards in the UI.

classes.name: HomeViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class for the HomeBrowseFragment, currently empty.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, sets up UI components, and loads static and dynamic content rows.

methods.name: buildStaticRows
methods.description: Creates static rows for settings and developer previews.

methods.name: loadDynamicRows
methods.description: Fetches categories and content from the repository and creates dynamic rows accordingly.

methods.name: onItemClicked
methods.description: Handles click events on items to navigate to details, live TV, or developer preview.

methods.name: onItemSelected
methods.description: Handles selection events; currently a no-op.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a view holder for a content card.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the card view for display.

methods.name: onUnbindViewHolder
methods.description: Handles cleanup of view holder; currently does nothing.
